name: Enchanteur Perfumed Body Lotion Enticing Satin Smooth
description:
Formulated with non-greasy Satin Smooth and specially enriched with Aloe Vera and Olive Butter to give your skin optimum moisturization and nourishment, Enchanteur Enticing Body Lotion also encapsulates vivacious fragrance of Rose combined with Magnolia."Show your skin the love it deserves, with Enchanteur Enticing Body Lotion.    This lotion is enriched with hydrating emollients that soften your skin and leave it deeply moisturised. The goodness of Aloe Vera, and the nourishing touch of Olive butter, make your skin smooth and glow from within. The non-greasy formula makes it light and easy to apply. Just a little is enough to give you huggable, soft skin, all day long."
Formulated with non-greasy Satin Smooth and specially enriched with Aloe Vera and Olive Butter to give your skin optimum moisturization and nourishment, Enchanteur Enticing Body Lotion also encapsulates vivacious fragrance of Rose combined with Magnolia."Show your skin the love it deserves, with Enchanteur Enticing Body Lotion. name: Vaseline Lotion Deep Restore
description:
Healing micro-droplets of Vaseline® Jelly combined with a fast-absorbing non-greasy moisturizing formula, the result is a lotion that moisturizes to heal very dry skin, leaving it looking and feeling healthier. We believe healthy skin starts with deep-restoring moisture. Our Intensive Care Deep Restore Lotion is infused with multi-layer moisture and nutrients that penetrate the skin deep down* absorbing quickly to leave your skin feeling healthy, soft, and smooth.
Healing micro-droplets of Vaseline® Jelly combined with a fast-absorbing non-greasy moisturizing formula, the result is a lotion that moisturizes to heal very dry skin, leaving it looking and feeling healthier. We believe healthy skin starts with deep-restoring moisture. Our Intensive Care Deep Restore Lotion is infused with multi-layer moisture and nutrients that penetrate the skin deep down* absorbing quickly to leave your skin feeling healthy, soft, and smooth.

name: Vaseline Lotion Healthy Bright
description:
Manufacturer: Unilever Ltd.Having healthy, glowing skin is a vital part of your overall health. Vaseline believes that truly healthy skin starts with deep healing of moisture. It’s not something you get by masking problems or through quick fixes. Your body produces melanin in response to pollutants and UV exposure which can lead to skin damage, darkening, and uneven skin tone. Vaseline Healthy Bright, our best Skin Brightening lotion helps heal dry damaged skin and restores naturally glowing skin in 2 weeks. With micro-droplets of Vaseline Jelly, the lotion helps heal skin. Along with Vitamin B3, which is known to inhibit the production and transfer of melanin, it brings back the skin’s healthy radiance. Triple sunscreens provide brightness protection by blocking UVA and UVB rays to protect your skin’s brightness from future damage. Use every day to help heal skin and make it look healthier and brighter. The result is a brightening lotion for the body that deeply moisturizes to help heal darkened, damaged skin, leaving it healthier and brighter. Healthy, naturally glowing skin in 2 weeks. Use twice a day for best results. Apply generously and massage till it gets absorbed. Healing by moisturization of normal dry skin. Action in the epidermal region and within the cosmetic domain.

name: Revive Moisturizing Lotion
description:
Revive Perfect Skin Moisturizing lotion has a unique formulation with active Sun Block which protects skin from the sun and gives you a wonderful feeling even outdoors. The specialized formulation retains your skin's natural fairness and keeps it perfect. Ingredients: Mineral Oil, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethicone and Cyclopentasiloxane, Vitamin E, Glycerine, Hydroxyethyl Cellulose, Carbopol, Allantoin, Vitamin B3, Bengkoang, DMDMH, Perfume, Aqua.
Revive Perfect Skin Moisturizing lotion has a unique formulation with active Sun Block which protects skin from the sun and gives you a wonderful feeling even outdoors. The specialized formulation retains your skin's natural fairness and keeps it perfect. Ingredients: Mineral Oil, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethicone and Cyclopentasiloxane, Vitamin E, Glycerine, Hydroxyethyl Cellulose, Carbopol, Allantoin, Vitamin B3, Bengkoang, DMDMH, Perfume, Aqua.

name: B.Tech Expert Aloe Vera Whitening Body Lotion
description:
The B.Tech Expert Aloe Vera Whitening Body Lotion (100 ml) is a non-sticky lotion designed to nourish and brighten the skin. It is enriched with Aloe Vera Extract, Soya Protein, and Effective Sunscreen, which protect the skin from harmful UV rays. The lotion works to prevent suntan, dark spots, and premature aging, while deeply moisturizing and softening the skin. Use: Ideal for daily use to keep the skin hydrated and protect it from sun damage.
The B.Tech Expert Aloe Vera Whitening Body Lotion (100 ml) is a non-sticky lotion designed to nourish and brighten the skin. It is enriched with Aloe Vera Extract, Soya Protein, and Effective Sunscreen, which protect the skin from harmful UV rays. The lotion works to prevent suntan, dark spots, and premature aging, while deeply moisturizing and softening the skin.
 
Use: Ideal for daily use to keep the skin hydrated and protect it from sun damage.

name: Garnier Body Bright Complete Serum Milk
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from France. This serum milk is enriched with lemon essence, proven to brighten dark spots and illuminate skin tone.Your body skin's fairness is improved in just 1 week!Formulated in a fast-absorbing & non sticky texture that makes your skin feel soft, supple and intensely moisturized all day long.Fortified with Moisture repairing nutrient to strengthen skin's protective barrier against moisture loss.Formulated with UVA/UVB Filters known to protect skin from the sun.Apply all over body. Not for use on face.For normal to dry skin.
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from France.

name: Parachute SkinPure Skin Lotion Natural Moisture
description:
Brand: Parachute SkinPure    Product Benefits: Soft, Glowing Skin    Item Form: Cream/Lotion    Material Type Free: Paraben, Sulphate Free    Skin Type: Suitable for All Skin Types| Recommended for Normal Skin    Liquid Volume: 200 ml    Special Feature: Contains Olive & Coconut Milk            • Parachute SkinPure Natural Moisture Body Lotion: Parachute SkinPure Natural Moisture Body Lotion is a luxurious skincare product formulated with the goodness of Coconut Milk and Olives, designed to provide soft and glowing skin.    • Goodness of Coconut Milk and Olives: This body lotion is enriched with Coconut Milk and Olives, two natural ingredients renowned for their moisturizing and nourishing properties. Olives help to soften the skin, while Coconut Milk contributes to naturally glowing and beautiful skin, leaving it feeling smooth, supple, and radiant.    • Soft and Glowing Skin: Regular use of Parachute SkinPure Natural Moisture Body Lotion helps to achieve soft and glowing skin. The combination of Coconut Milk and Olives deeply moisturizes and hydrates the skin, improving its texture and overall appearance.    •  Natural Moisturizers: Parachute SkinPure Natural Moisture Body Lotion is made from  natural moisturizers, which nourish the skin from within. These natural ingredients penetrate deep into the skin's layers, providing long-lasting hydration and leaving the skin feeling nourished and rejuvenated.    • Suitable for All Skin Types: Parachute SkinPure Natural Moisture Body Lotion is suitable for all skin types, making it ideal for daily use by individuals with varying skincare needs. Its gentle formula ensures optimal hydration without greasiness or residue, making it suitable for use on the face and body to maintain healthy, moisturized, and glowing skin. Incorporate it into your skincare routine for soft, smooth, and radiant-looking skin that lasts all day.    • No Harmful Chemicals: This product is free from harmful chemicals like silicones, parabens, and sulphates. Its gentle formula ensures that your skin receives pure, natural care without any potentially damaging ingredients.

name: Parachute SkinPure Skin Lotion Natural White
description:
Parachute SkinPure Skin Lotion Natural White  Enriched with the goodness of COCONUT MILK & SANDALWOOD. SANDALWOOD makes the skin fairer and COCONUT MILK gives naturally glowing beautiful skin. It’s made from natural moisturisers which goes 10 layer deep into the skin to nourish from within. Suitable for all skin types. Recommended for Oily Skin and Dull Skin.

name: Garnier Body Bright Complete Serum Milk UV
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from France. Garnier Light Extra Milk Lotion is a nourishing and hydrating body lotion designed to leave your skin feeling soft, smooth, and radiant. This generous 400 ml bottle contains a specialized formula that combines the benefits of milk and lotion to provide deep moisturization and care for your skin. Garnier, a brand known for its commitment to skincare innovation, offers you a product that helps you achieve beautifully moisturized and healthy-looking skin.

name: Vaseline Lotion Aloe Fresh
description:
Manufacturer: Unilever Bangladesh Ltd.  Aloe vera extract enriched body lotion. • Non sticky lotion  • Feather-light formula with non greasy feel  • Instantly absorbs 5 layers deep for healthy soft skin  Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Palmitic Acid (And) Stearic Acid, Glycol Stearate (And) Stearamide Amp, Isopropyl Palmitate, Petrolatum, Triethanolamine, Glyceryl Stearate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Menthol, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Titanium Dioxide, Carbomer, Tapioca Starch, Phenoxyethanol, Methyl Paraben, Propyl Paraben, Perfume, Disodium Edta, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool.

name: Vaseline Intensive Care Aloe Smoothe Body Lotion
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from United Kingdom. Manufacturer: Unilever Ltd. • Vaseline® Intensive Care Aloe Soothe Body Lotion moisturises dry skin  • Formulated with Pure Aloe Vera Extract, known to calm and soothe dry irritated skin. • With micro-droplets of Vaseline® Jelly to lock in moisture and restore damaged skin from deep within* leaving your skin deeply moisturised  • Fast absorbing lotion for a non-greasy feel • Best For: Dry skin, Stressed skin, Sunburn dryness Water, Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Glycol Stearate, Isopropyl Palmitate, Petrolatum, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glyceryl Stearate, Lactic Acid, Cetyl Alcohol,Dimethicone, Tapioca Starch, Triethanolamine, Carbomer, Perfume, Titanium Dioxide, Disodium Edta, Stearamide AMP, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Propylparaben.

name: Nivea Express Hydration Body Lotion
description:
Does your skin feel greasy after applying a lotion? You need a non-greasy, ultra-light and fast absorbing body lotion. NIVEA Express Hydration Body Lotion is enriched with sea minerals and Hydra IQ, which work deep within the skin, repairing your dry skin layer by layer to make it soft and supple. External factors like cold weather, exposure to the sun, can be harsh for the skin and cause water loss, but this body lotion keeps your skin hydrated, moisturized and completely nourished. The ultra-light formula is perfect for normal skin. Layer it on, just after a bath or just before you step out of the house, the fragrance and effect of the body lotion will be with you all day long. Tip: Use immediately after towel drying your skin to enhance absorption. This Body lotion is free of animal derived ingredients and colorants. Skin compatibility dermatologically approved.  • Absorbs in seconds.  • Leaves your skin soft and supple immediately.  • Formula with Sea Minerals supplies you with moisture all day.  • Extra fast absorption  • Hydra IQ  • 24hrs moisture  • Contains sea minerals.

name: Vaseline Lotion Healthy Bright
description:
Manufacturer: Unilever Ltd.Vaseline lotion is specially formulated with Triple sunscreens and vitamin B3 that work together to help protect from the sun and make your skin look brighter in 2 weeks. It contains micro-droplets of vaseline jelly which helps heal damage from deep within. Triple sunscreens protect your skin from UVA and UVB.Vitamin B3 inhibits melanin transfer to skin look brighter.
Manufacturer: Unilever Ltd.

name: Nivea Intensive Moisture Body Milk Lotion
description:
Say hello to deeply moisturized skin with the new NIVEA Nourishing Lotion Body Milk with deep moisture serum. This rich and creamy formula with 2 times more almond oil deeply moisturizes and softens your dry skin. The lotion gives you deep moisturization for up to 48 hours after a single application. 48hrs Intensive moisture care  Contains the Deep Moisture Serum  Contains 2x almond oil  Includes the Liquid Creme.

name: Enchanteur Perfumed Body Lotion Charming Satin Smooth
description:
ENCHANTEUR Radiant White Perfumed Body Lotion keeps your skin moisturised and radiantly fairer while leaving it gorgeously fragrant. • Contains Micro Glow Reflectors for instantly visible fairness  • Pomegranate extract evens skin tone and strengthens skin barrier  • UV Protection prevents skin from further darkening  • Air-light skin feel  • Infused with ENCHANTEUR Charming fragrance  Dermatologically tested  0% *Alcohol * Paraben * Mineral Oil * Artificial colour * Animal testing  "Show your skin the love it deserves, with Enchanteur Charming Body Lotion. This lotion is enriched with hydrating emollients that soften your skin and leave it deeply moisturised. The goodness of Aloe Vera, and the nourishing touch of Olive butter, make your skin smooth and glow from within. The non-greasy formula makes it light and easy to apply. Just a little is enough to give you huggable, soft skin, all day long."
